name: Space Gun Unloaded
description:
How to play:

  • Use the mouse to aim
  • LMB to shoot
  • Move with the recoil from the gun
  • Have fun!

I can distribute Linux and OSX builds if there's any interest.
I want to keep working on this game, so there will hopefully be updates!

Original made in ~3 days for MiniLD 72 elympics
